      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Covalent bonds in molecular substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kovalente Bindungen in den molekularen 
Substanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obligations covalentes dans les substances 
moléculaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligações covalent em substâncias molecular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legami covalenti in sostanze molecolari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομοιοπολικοί δεσμοί στις μοριακές ουσίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enlaces covalentes en sustancias moleculares</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams show the sharing of electrons in the highest energy levels which forms covalent bonds for the water and methane molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy levels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sharing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen das Teilen der Elektronen 
in den Stufen der höchsten Energie, welche kovalente Bindungen der 
Formulare für die Wasser- und Methanmoleküle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes montrent le partage des électrons
dans les forces les plus élevées quelles obligations covalentes de 
formes pour les molécules de l'eau et de méthane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas mostram compartilhar dos 
elétrons nos níveis de energia a mais elevada que ligações 
covalent dos formulários para as moléculas da água e do methane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi mostrano la compartecipazione degli
elettroni nei livelli di più alta energia quali legami covalenti 
delle forme per le molecole del metano e dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα εμφανίζουν τη διανομή των 
ηλεκτρονίων στα πιό υψηλά ενεργειακά επίπεδα που διαμορφώνει 
τους ομοιοπολικούς δεσμούς για τα μόρια ύδατος και μεθανίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas muestran compartir de electrones 
en los niveles de la energía más alta qué enlaces covalentes de las
formas para las moléculas del agua y del metano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kovalente Bindungen</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronen</string>
          </keyword>
